snippet.title: The Pro Yakyuu: Pennant Race TV Commercial (SMS, 1987)
snippet.description:
This is a classic Japanese TV ad for Sega's The Pro Yakyuu Pennant Race (Master System) that was shown ìn the late 1980's.

The Pro Yakyuu: Pennant Race (ザ・プロ野球 ペナントレース) is a Sega Master System baseball game developed by Whiteboard and published by Sega. Exclusively released in Japan in 1987, the game is an evolution of the developer's earlier title Great Baseball, and is now played from a bird's-eye perspective.

©1987 Sega Enterprises Ltd. All rights are reserved. This video is solely for historical, educational and entertainment purposes.
